subject: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Lisa,

It is my heart desire to ensure you receive your ATM card without passing through further pains. Many fund beneficiaries have gone through hell in the hands of those satanic executives without having anything to show despite all their efforts. The decision to assist you was born out of my Christian background and also to put a stop to those sinister acts. I am communicating to you with my personal email address for the security and safety of the funds.

My good friend, I am glad for your determination to protect me, my husband and kids. Based on this I must ensure you receive this ATM card as soon as possible.

As you know, CBN is highly guarded by security operatives and we the Staffs are searched thoroughly. I will go ahead to pick it out from the place where I kept it inside the bank between tomorrow and next so all I require from you is prayer for God's protection and solid promise to Guide the information.

As soon as I pick it out from our office, I will arrange on how to dispatch it to you within 24hours.
I shall get back to you as soon as I am through.

Remain blessed!
Regards,
Mrs Judith Oduluso.
Office assistant to the Central Bank Governor.

subject: Re: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Mrs. Judith Oduluso,

Thank you for reaching out to me and offering your assistance. I appreciate your concern for my well-being and the effort you are making to ensure that I receive my ATM card safely.

I understand that there have been unfortunate incidents in the past, and it is reassuring to know that you are taking extra precautions to protect me, my husband, and kids. Safety is indeed a top priority.

Could you please provide me with more details about how the process will work once you pick up the ATM card from your office? How long do you think it will take for the card to be dispatched to me? Also, what should I expect in terms of any fees or charges associated with this process?

Thank you again for your assistance, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lisa

subject: Re: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Mrs. Judith Oduluso,

Thank you for reaching out to me and offering your assistance. I appreciate your concern for my well-being and the effort you are making to ensure that I receive my ATM card safely.

I understand that there have been unfortunate incidents in the past, and it is reassuring to know that you are taking steps to prevent any further problems. Can you please provide me with more details about how the ATM card will be dispatched to me? I want to make sure that it will be delivered securely.

Also, could you clarify what kind of protection and guidance I need to offer in return? I want to ensure that I fulfill my part of the agreement properly.

Thank you again for your help, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lisa

subject: Re: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Lisa,

I am glad to inform you that I have succeeded in bringing out your ATM card and also contacted the DHL courier service firm concerning the delivery of the card to your home address and was informed that it will cost us the sum of $365 for the delivery including logistics .However I have the sum of $100. so, we need the sum of $265. to complete the amount required.  The card will be accompanied with classified documents.

Meanwhile here is the information of the last one I sent through UPS COURIER SERVICE FIRM AND DHL RESPECTIVELY.

UPS.COM
TRACKING NUMBER: 1Z9E74W46643439729

DHL:4148352865

I await your urgent positive response.
Thanks, and God bless.

Mrs Judith Oduluso.
Office assistant to the Central Bank Governor

subject: Re: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Mrs. Judith Oduluso,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing an update on my ATM card. I appreciate your efforts in contacting the DHL courier service firm for the delivery. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Could you please clarify what you mean by "classified documents" accompanying the card? What kind of documents are these?

2. Is there any specific reason why the delivery cost is so high? Can you break down the logistics expenses for me?

3. Can you provide more information about the previous delivery sent through UPS COURIER SERVICE FIRM AND DHL? How long did it take for the package to arrive, and were there any issues during the process?

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Lisa

subject: Re: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Lisa,

The classified documents include the following:

(1) All the approvals from United nations and the federal government respectively. Also clearance from different security agencies to exonerate it from terrorism and drugs funds.

(2)There's increase in delivery cost by the shipping firm and also the cost of transporting it to the airport.

(3) If you can track the dhl numbers given to you, It shows that they were successfully delivered without any hitch on the way so once it is dispatched it will get to your destination before three days.

I await your urgent positive response.
Thanks, and God bless.

Mrs Judith Oduluso.
Office assistant to the Central Bank Governor

subject: Re: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Mrs. Judith Oduluso,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have shared regarding the approvals and clearances for the package. It's good to know that all necessary steps have been taken to ensure its legitimacy.

I understand that there has been an increase in delivery cost by the shipping firm and also the cost of it to the airport. Could you please provide more details about these costs? I would like to have a better understanding of why they have increased.

Regarding tracking the DHL numbers, I will definitely check on that. Can you please confirm if the package has already been dispatched? If so, I will make sure to keep an eye on the tracking information.

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Lisa

subject: Re: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Lisa,

The increament came as a result of high cost of aviation fuel and astronomical increase in the cost of economic realities.

The tracking numbers are the sample of the previous delivery I made in the past to their respective owners and here is the last dhl package I sent to one of the beneficiaries for your confirmation.

DHL:

(1) www.dhl.com 4148352865
(2) www.dhl.com 1574633955

Once you sent the fee it will only take few days to get to your destination as earlier promised.

I await your urgent positive response.
Thanks, and God bless.

Mrs Judith Oduluso.
Office assistant to the Central Bank Governor

subject: Re: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Mrs. Judith Oduluso,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information. I understand that the increment in cost is due to the high cost of aviation fuel and economic realities. It's interesting to know that the tracking numbers are samples of previous deliveries made in the past.

Could you please clarify what exactly the fee is for? Is it related to the delivery of the package mentioned earlier? I just want to make sure I have a clear understanding.

Also, could you provide more details about how long it will take for the package to reach me once the fee is sent? I would appreciate any additional information you can provide.

Thank you again for your response, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lisa

subject: Re: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Lisa,

The fee is for the delivery of the package and you will not be required to pay more.

It will take three working days or additional one day if there's any weather obstruction along the line.

I await your urgent positive response.
Thanks, and God bless.

Mrs Judith Oduluso.
Office assistant to the Central Bank Governor

subject: Re: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Mrs. Judith Oduluso,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your response and the information you provided about the fee for the delivery of the package. It's good to know that there won't be any additional charges.

I understand that sometimes weather conditions can cause delays, so I appreciate you mentioning that it might take an extra day if there's any bad weather along the way. Is there a tracking number or any way for me to keep track of the package during its delivery?

Also, could you please let me know what steps I need to take in order to ensure a smooth delivery? Should I provide any specific details or documents?

Thank you again for your assistance, and I look forward to your prompt reply.

Best wishes,
Lisa

subject: Re: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Lisa,

You will be given a tracking number from DHL as soon as the shipment is dispatched to enable you know when it will arrive.

The only thing you are required to provide is your current home address to avoid any mistakes during the time of delivery.

I await your urgent positive response.
Thanks, and God bless.

Mrs Judith Oduluso.
Office assistant to the Central Bank Governor

subject: Re: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Mrs. Judith Oduluso,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance in providing the tracking number for the shipment. It's good to know that DHL will be handling the delivery.

I understand the importance of providing my current home address to ensure a smooth delivery process. However, before I share that information, could you please clarify what exactly is being shipped? Is it related to any recent transactions or activities I have had with the Central Bank?

I look forward to your response and appreciate your help.

Best wishes,
Lisa

subject: Re: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Lisa,

I have explained this issue overtime, so I am completely surprise if till now you don't know what will be shipped to you. However let me still inform you once again that it is your ATM card that contains the approved funds of $10 million usd and the classified documents to that effect.

I await your urgent positive response.
Thanks, and God bless.

Mrs Judith Oduluso.
Office assistant to the Central Bank Governor

subject: Re: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Mrs. Judith Oduluso,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize if I seem a bit confused, but I don't recall discussing any shipment with you before. Could you please provide me with more details about this ATM card and the approved funds? I want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "classified documents"? What purpose do they serve in relation to the ATM card?

I appreciate your prompt response and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lisa

subject: Re: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Lisa,
I hope we are not getting confused more and more, we have been talking about DHL since the beginning of our conversation so of what good will dhl serve in this regard. I also sent you some samples which you confirmed so why have you chosen to turn around.

Finally the ATM card contains the approved funds by united nations and federal government respectively which serve as a compensation/ inheritance. Please you can indicate immediately if you are not the rightful owner of the ATM card. I have also said much about the classified documents that will be attached to it.
Thanks, and God bless.

Mrs Judith Oduluso.
Office assistant to the Central Bank Governor

subject: Re: RE INFORMATION LISA
body:
Dear Mrs. Judith Oduluso,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize if there has been any confusion in our previous conversations. Regarding DHL, I believe we were discussing it as a potential option for delivering the samples you mentioned. However, I am still curious about how the ATM card is related to this.

You mentioned that the ATM card contains approved funds by the United Nations and federal government. Could you please provide more information on how these funds are connected to me? Also, what exactly do you mean by "classified documents" that will be attached to the ATM card?

I appreciate your assistance in clarifying these details.

Best wishes,
Lisa
